info.name: WordPress.org Plugin Directory Enhanced
info.description:
Tweaks the updated (since Spring 2017) WordPress.org Plugin Directory to make it usable again on Desktop computers. No more stupid "Read more" toggles and other helpful tweaks, not only for power users.

This style was created to speed up the research for plugins for developers, site builders, journalists - to get a better overview, faster. It uses more colors, more contrast to make various sections better differentiate from other other areas/ sections.

Sections it tweaks:
- Plugin listings / archives
- Single plugin view
- User profiles (of authors)
- Support forums / Review boards
- Theme listing
- Single theme view
info.additionalInfo:
v1.8.2 - 2019-09-23:
  • - Few bug bug/style fixes, especially for plugins directory
  • - Theme single view: improved translations link/ button
v1.8.1 -- 2018-07-24:
  • - User profiles: some improvements for user info/ links
  • - User profiles: more activity link types are supported now
v1.8.0 -- 2018-07-17:
  • - User profiles: implemented tweaks and fixes for the updated styling from .org
  • - Make style compatible with latest changes in Firefox (mozilla links) and surrounding the "Stylish" Browser Add-On)
  • - NOTE: I can only recommend the "Stylus" Browser Add-On from now on - which has NO tracking built-in and generally works like a charm
v1.7.2 -- 2018-04-23:
  • - Changelogs: small fixes
v1.7.1 -- 2018-04-19:
  • - User Profiles: some additions and improvements
v1.7 -- 2018-04-16:
  • - Plugins browser: hover styles
  • - Themes browser: hover styles
  • - Themes (single Theme): styling the theme page
v1.6 -- 2018-04-13:
  • - Plugins: Various little improvements and fixes
  • - User Profiles: Great improvements and fixes (activity stream etc.)
v1.5.1 -- 2018-02-28:
  • - Various little improvements and fixes
v1.5 -- 2018-02-02:
  • - Various improvements and fixes in a lot of views/ areas
v1.4 -- 2017-04-17:
  • - Various improvements and fixes in a lot of views/ areas
v1.3 -- 2017-04-10:
  • - Single Plugin view: added media queries for main content and sidebar
  • - Single Plugin view: few tweaks and improvements for the "Advanced View"
  • - Some minor fixes
v1.2 -- 2017-04-08:
  • - Improvements and tweaks for Screenshots Section
  • - Improvements and fixes for FAQ Section
  • - Added stylings and tweaks to directory homepage and various Views (Favorites, Beta, etc.)
  • - Some minor fixes
v1.1 -- 2017-04-07:
  • - Minor fixes
  • - Added subtle tweaks for profile pages
v1.0 -- 2017-04-05 -- Initial Release:
  • - Removes "Featured" section on plugin directory home page
  • - Removes "Locale Banners" that point non-English-speaking users to localized sites - but it is annoying to see these banners everywhere, especially for power users
  • - Removes the stupid "Read more" toggles --> all content on the page, already opened!
  • - Increase width of main content (left), reduce width of meta data (right sidebar)
  • - Visual tweaks to section headlines and FAQ section to make it more appealing to capture content on first sight
  • - Visual tweaks for plugin cards, to better capture overview of plugins on first sight
  • - Visual tweaks to pagination when browsing plugin cards
  • - Subtle tweaks to Plugin Reviews and Support Forum section
